messages.subject: Re: Kim in MO
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kim.. that s quite ok..I did think about you this past Sunday when my girls and I went to a cousin s birthday party in St Louis, (Baldwin actually) I
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kim.. that's quite ok..I did think about you this past Sunday when my
girls and I went to a cousin's birthday party in St Louis, (Baldwin
actually) I probably was pretty close to where you live. Maybe our families
could meet at the Science Center, Zoo or Art Museum sometime this summer..
that would be fun. Oh, there's also a very neat-hands on Aquarium too!
We are moving in 3 more weeks, to a mini-homestead, so that should keep us
busy for awhile. Planting the garden, finding some goat babies and seeing
what's in and around the pond!
Julie in MO

>Hi Julie,
>I am in Southern Jefferson County, Missouri. Where
>are you located maybe we could get together for a
>field trip or something. If we are even remotely close
>geographically. I just pulled my kids out of public
>school in January so we are very new to all of this.
>Most of the time we just "wing it"

>> Julie, We have already been over that haven't we. I
>am sorry it is late and I knew I should have went to
>bed instead of checking e-mail. That just backs it up
>for me. Good night! I will be OK in the morning!
>LOL
